messages.add_question_or_request_counselor:
Can't find what you're looking for?

messages.ask_question:
Please type in the question you would like to ask.
You will be notified when your question has been answered.
You cna also suggest a new category of questions in your feedback.

Use /cancel to cancel operation otherwise.
messages.ask_question_success:
Your question has been sent to the CCI Counseling team.

You will be notified when a response is posted.

Use /menu to go back to the main menu.
messages.bc:

messages.bc_help:
How to use broadcast types

ğŸ‘‰ text - Send written text broadcast to all users
ğŸ‘‰ photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
ğŸ‘‰ video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
ğŸ‘‰ animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.

Use /cancel to cancel operation.

messages.conversation_already_started:
Sorry, this counseling request has already been picked up by another pastor and is currently being attended to.

Please select another request from the ones above or use the button below to get unattended counseling requests.

Thank you.
messages.conversation_end_prompt:
Are you sure you want to end this conversation?

The {} you are currently speaking to will be notified when you end the conversation.
messages.conversation_end_cancel: Okay! Keep sending messages to continue your counseling session.
messages.conversation_end_confirm: You have successfully ended this conversation. Thank you for your time.
messages.conversation_end_notify:
The {} has ended the conversation.

Thank you for your time.
messages.conversation_start:
You have started a conversation with {}.

Messages you send from this point will be sent to the user you are chatting with and they will in-turn send messages to you. At any point in time, you will be able to end the conversation using the command /cancel.

 Please note that once you end the conversation, you messages will no longer be sent to the user so ensure that the conversation has been fully concluded and that the user is aware that you are ending the conversation before you do.

 If you need to direct the user to the Lead pastor, Pastor Emmanuel Iren for further counseling, use the button below to send a one-time use calendly link to the user which will allow them schedule a meeting with Pastor Emmanuel Iren.

Thank you and God bless!
messages.conversation_start_user:
Hello!

**You are now in a conversation with Pastor {}.**

As you communicate, Please be respectful and mindful of your language as will the pastor.

Messages you send from this point  will be sent to the pastor and you will also replies from the pastor. If you wish to no longer continue the conversation, kindly notify the pastor and they will end the conversation or you can end the conversation using /cancel.

You will be notified if the pastor also decides to end the conversation.

Thank you and God bless you
messages.counseling_feedback_prompt:
Please take a moment to rate your counseling session with Pastor {}.

Use the buttons below to provide a rating on a scale of 1 - 5.

1 - Not Satisfactory
5 - Excellent.
messages.counseling_feedback_thanks:
Thank you for the feedback you have provided!

God bless you!

messages.cr_yes:

messages.help:
You can now use BUTTONS or the COMMAND MENU to pass commands to the bot.
Here's how the buttons below work

ğŸ‘‰ latest sermon - This gives you the most recent sermon available on the [website](http://ccing.org/sermons/)

ğŸ‘‰ get sermon - This helps you get a specific sermon by it's title. You can search using the exact title or a keyword.
Searching for a keyword (e.g Grace) would give you all sermon containing the keyword in their titles.

ğŸ‘‰ devotional - Get today's devotional

ğŸ‘‰ map - This helps you find the nearest MAP centre to your location.

You can other perform other commands using the COMMAND MENU.
These commands include:
â€¢ /cancel - Cancel any existing actionâœ–ï¸
â€¢ /menu - Get the default keyboardâŒ¨ï¸
â€¢ /membership - Register for membership schoolğŸ«
â€¢ /newsletter - Subscribe to the CCI NewsletterğŸ—
â€¢ /mute - Mute notifications from CCI BotğŸ˜”
â€¢ /unmute - Unmute bot notificationsğŸ¤©
